column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Good food but a bit pricey for my taste. I very much enjoyed the ambience. Nice music
column2: and rustic decor. I ordered the pintxos platter
column5: and seared sea scallop. All of it was good
column6: but the best thing I tasted was the buttermilk-fried chicken thighs. BEST FRIED CHICKEN I HAVE EVER TRIED.
